settings.title: Gulab (Rose petals)
settings.ing_description:
Rosa centifolia 

Dahshamak - Rich in vitamins A and C, iron, calcium and antioxidants
settings.ing_description_2:
Saccharum Officinarum

Pittahar - Rich source of energy and, a natural preservative

settings.title: Praval pishti
settings.ing_description:
Coral triturated with lemon & rose water

Pittadoshhar Raktaprasadan -Rich source of calcium and magnesium
settings.ing_description_2:
Emblica officinalis

Rasayan Pittashamak - Rich source of vitamins A, B, C,  Iron, and Calcium

settings.title: Lavang (Cloves)
settings.ing_description:
Syzygium aromaticum

Deepan - Rich source of vitamin K, E, Omega-3, and minerals
settings.ing_description_2:
Zingiber officinale

Pachan - Rich source of sodium, potassium, vitamin C and D

settings.title: Brahmi
settings.ing_description:
Bacopa Monnieri

Shamak - Rich in Iron, protein, vitamin C, calcium and phosphorus
settings.ing_description_2:
Terminalia arjuna

Shaithalya - Rich in amino acids, antioxidants, calcium, and other minerals

settings.title: Musta
settings.ing_description:
Cyperus rotundus

Kledahar - Rich in fiber, sodium, calcium, and other minerals
settings.ing_description_2:
Piper nigrum

Strotoshodhan - Rich in minerals, anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and other therapeutic properties.

settings.title: Shilajeet Shudh
settings.ing_description:
Black bitumen

Balya - Rich is iron, calcium, other minerals, vitamins and therapeutic agents.
settings.ing_description_2:
Crocus sativus

Uddeepak - Rich in antioxidants, vitamins and minerals.

settings.title: Nirgundi
settings.ing_description:
Vitex negundo

Shulashaman (Pain Relief) -Contains calcium, phosphorus, vitamin C and other nutrients.
settings.ing_description_2:
Roots of a group of ten herbs

Shothahar (Reduces local swelling) - Contains antioxidants and anti-inflammatory agents.

settings.title: Coconut oil
settings.ing_description:
Cocos nucifera

Keshya (Nourishment of hairs) - Vitamin B, magnesium, potassium and other nutrients.
settings.ing_description_2:
Sesamum indicium 

Snehan (Flexibility to joint musculature) - Contains riboflavin, zinc, niacin, and other nutrients.

settings.title: Kumari swaras
settings.ing_description:
Aloe barbadensis

Keshamardav (Glossy and smooth hairs) - Amino acids, vitamins, enzymes and minerals.
settings.ing_description_2:
Bacopa monnieri

Shaman (Helps in regulation of blood flow, anxiolytic) - Alkaloids, amino acids, saponins and other nutrients.

settings.title: Amla Juice
settings.ing_description:
Emblica officinalis

Amla Juice - Rich in vitamin C, this ingredient supports
digestion and helps in reducing acidity.
settings.ing_description_2:
Cuminum Cyminum

Jeera - Improves digestion and prevents flatulence.

settings.title: Pudina
settings.ing_description:
Mentha Piprata

Pudina - Cools and soothes the digestive system, reducing bloating and discomfort.
settings.ing_description_2:
Phyllanthus emblica

Amla - Rich in Vitamin C, this powerful ingredient helps boost immunity, improve digestion, and promote hair health.

settings.title: Cinnamon
settings.ing_description:
Cinnamomum Zylanicum

Cinnamon - Rich in vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and other nutrients with anti-diabetic properties.
settings.ing_description_2:
Momordica Charantia

Karela - Rich in Vitamin, minerals, antioxidants and anti inflammatory agents.

settings.title: Methi
settings.ing_description:
Trigonella Foenum

Methi - Rich in iron, manganese, magnesium, fibers and other therapeutic agents.
settings.ing_description_2:
Malus Domestica

Apple Cider Vinegar - Vitamin C, iron, potassium, calcium, fibers and potential antioxidants.

settings.title: Lemon
settings.ing_description:
Citrus limon

Lemon - Citric acid, polyphenols, vitamin B, C and minerals.
settings.ing_description_2:
Cyperus rotundus

Honey - Amino acids, enzymes, vitamins, minerals and healthy sugars.

settings.text: Note: The color of this product may differ from the one shown on the package due to the change in batch as all ingredients used are 100% natural. Though all ingredients have health benefits, in no way do we assume and suggest replacing them with the medicines prescribed by your health care provider for a particular health condition. Also, we highly recommend seeking advice from a medical practitioner before commencing the use of any product.
